media_credit: Sahiba Chawdhary for The New York Times
description: Frustrated by the steep commissions and discounts that apps like Zomato and Uber Eats push on restaurants, thousands have started a movement to #Logout from them.
media_description: A Zomato delivery agent collecting a delivery order at a restaurant in the Galleria Market in Gurugram, a New Delhi suburb home to many tech companies, including Zomato.

title: Indias Restaurants Rebel Against Food Delivery Apps

media_credit: Aileen Son for The New York Times
description: A state proposal, Assembly Bill 5, could give working drivers more employee rights. The companies said they were willing to start a ballot initiative to thwart it.
media_description: Travelers waiting for rides to arrive at San Francisco International Airport. Uber and Lyft are fighting a bill in California that would change the legal designation of their drivers.
creator: Kate Conger

title: Uber, Lyft and DoorDash Pledge $90 Million to Fight Driver Legislation in California

description: With more than 200 cases of respiratory illnesses possibly related to vaping, and no single culprit, public health experts are advising young people not to buy cannabis and other e-cigarette products off the street.
